testcase.name: Register as student
testcase.preconditions: Registration should be successful.

step.actions: Click on the "Register student" item on left panel.
step.expectedresults: You will be redirected to registration form "Register as New Student".

step.actions:
Enter "Ruszinka" into Last Name input.
Enter "boris98nhl@gmail.com" into e-mail input.
Enter "2017/2018" option in dropdown button.
Fill "Terms and condtitions" checkbox.
step.expectedresults: Message box "Vyplňte toto pole" will appear under "First Name" input.

step.actions:
Enter "Erik" into First Name input.
Enter "boris98nhl@gmail.com" into e-mail input.
Enter "2017/2018" option in dropdown button.
Fill "Terms and condtitions" checkbox.
step.expectedresults: Message box "Vyplňte toto pole" will appear under "Last Name" input.

step.actions:
Clear all inputs and:
Enter "Erik" into First Name input.
Enter "Ruszinka" into Last Name input.
Enter "2017/2018" option in dropdown button.
Fill "Terms and condtitions" checkbox.
step.expectedresults: Message box "Vyplňte toto pole" will appear under "E-Mail Address" input.

step.actions:
Enter "Erik" into First Name input.
Enter "Ruszinka" into Last Name input.
Enter "boris98nhl@gmail.com" into e-mail input.
Fill "Terms and condtitions" checkbox.
step.expectedresults: Message box "Vyberte položku zo zoznamu" will appear under "First year of study" dropdown button.

step.actions:
Enter "Erik" into First Name input.
Enter "Ruszinka" into Last Name input.
Enter "boris98nhl@gmail.com" into e-mail input.
Enter "2017/2018" option in dropdown button.
step.expectedresults: Message box "Ak chcete pokračovať. začiarknite toto políčko" will appear under "Terms and conditions" checkbox.

step.actions: Click on "Terms and conditions" below.
step.expectedresults: Dialog window will be open.

step.actions: Inside of dialog window for "Terms and conditions", click on grey cross in top right corner.
step.expectedresults: Dialog window will disappear.

step.actions:
Enter "Erik" into First Name input.
Enter "Ruszinka" into Last Name input.
Enter "boris98nhl@gmail.com" into e-mail input.
Enter "2017/2018" option in dropdown button.
Fill "Terms and condtitions" checkbox.
step.expectedresults: You will be redirected to login page. There will be message "Student succesfully registered" under "Password" input.

testcase.name: Login
testcase.summary:
Check login functionality with:

1.) valid e-mail and invalid password

2.) invalid e-mail and invalid password

3.) invalid e-mail and valid password

4.) valid e-mail and valid password
testcase.preconditions: Registration process should be successful only when 4. case stated in summary will be done.

step.actions: Enter "john.doe@gmail.com" e-mail address into the email input. Next enter "12345" into password field.
step.expectedresults: Warning message "Wrong password" will appear above.

step.actions: Enter "johndoe@gmail.com" e-mail address into the email input. Next enter "12345" into password field.
step.expectedresults: Warning message "User not found" will appear above.

step.actions: Enter "johndoe@gmail.com" e-mail into the email input. Next enter "1234" into password field.
step.expectedresults: Warning message "User not found" will appear above.

step.actions: Enter "john.doe@gmail.com" e-mail into the email input. Next enter "1234" into password field.
step.expectedresults: You will be redirected to dashboard screen. White windows "Most recent test results" and "New registrations" will appear.

testcase.name: Approve student
testcase.preconditions: Student will be approved by teacher and his password will be sent by e-mail message.

step.actions: Click on the red "Decline" button for Try Student in the right side of "New registrations" window.
step.expectedresults: Try Student will be removed. Record will disappear from the screen. Message "User deleted" in red box will appear in the top of the screen.

step.actions: Click on the green "Accept" button for Erik Ruszinka in the right side of "New registrations" window.
step.expectedresults: Erik Ruszinka will be approved. Record will disappear from the screen.

testcase.name: Auto Logout
testcase.summary:
Check if user is automatically logged out because of inactivity.
(This test case is not necessary)

 

Test data:

E-mail: john.doe@gmail.com

Password: 1234
testcase.preconditions: User will not be not authorized to view other pages.

step.actions: Log in. Use test data stated above in summary field.
step.expectedresults: Login must be successful.

step.actions: Wait 10 minutes, then click on any item placed in left panel (Dashboard, My tests, Create test, Students).
step.expectedresults: Warning window "You are not authorized to view this page" will appear.

testcase.name: Create new category
testcase.summary:
Check functionality of creating new category.
Check creating of duplicate categories.
testcase.preconditions:
New category should be succesfully created.
Creating of two simillar categories will not be permitted.
Creating of category with blank title will not be possible.

step.actions: Click on "Create test" item on left panel.
step.expectedresults: Window "Create new test" will appear.

step.actions: Click on the dropdown button above with preset text "HTML".
step.expectedresults:
Dropdown button will show 2 options.

HTML, Java.

step.actions: Click on "Create new category" option placed below.
step.expectedresults: Dialog window "Create new category" will appear in the top of the screen.

step.actions: Enter "C++" into the field in dialog window. Then click on the cross in the top right corner of the window.
step.expectedresults: Dialog window will disappear.

step.actions: Click on the dropdown button above with preset text "HTML".
step.expectedresults:
Dropdown button will show 2 options.

HTML, Java

step.actions: Click on "Create new category" option placed below.
step.expectedresults: Dialog window "Create new category" will appear in the top of the screen.

step.actions: Enter one or more spaces into the field in dialog window. Then click on the "Save" button placed in the bottom right corner.
step.expectedresults: Warning message "Category field is empty" will appear next to the "Save" button.

step.actions: Delete entered space/spaces and enter "HTML" into the field.
step.expectedresults: Warning message "Category already exist" will appear.

step.actions: Delete entered text and enter more than 255 characters into the field and click on the "Save" button.
step.expectedresults: Warning message "There was some problem with database" will appear.

step.actions: Delete entered text and enter "C++" into the field in dialog window. Then click on the "Save" button in the bottom right corner of the window.
step.expectedresults: Dialog window will disappear.

step.actions: Click on the dropdown button above with preset text "HTML".
step.expectedresults:
Dropdown button will show 3 options.

HTML, Java, C++

testcase.name: Create new test
testcase.summary:
Check functionality of creating new test.
Check if creating of tests with simillar titles will not be permitted.
testcase.preconditions: New test should be succesfully created.

step.actions:
Click on "Create test" item on left panel.
If you are currently on "Create test" page, you may skip this step.
step.expectedresults: Window "Create new test" will appear.

step.actions: Click on input placed above and select choice "Java".
step.expectedresults: Java category will be chosen.

step.actions: Enter "Exercise test" into "Test name" input below.
step.expectedresults: Blue button "Start creating test" will appear in the bottom of window.

step.actions: Delete whole entered text in "Test name" input.
step.expectedresults: Blue button "Start creating test" will disappear from screen.

step.actions: Insert "Exercise test" into "Test name" input below. Then click on button "Start creating test".
step.expectedresults: Your test is now created. You will be redirected to another screen. White window with "Test name: Exercise test" on the top will appear. On the right side there is stated "Test category: Java".

step.actions: Click on "Create test" item on left panel. Insert into "Test name" input "Exercise text" and click on the button "Start creating test".
step.expectedresults: Warning message "Test already exists" will appear in bottom right corner of window and content of input will be erased.

testcase.name: Show tests
testcase.summary: Check functionality of displaying of all tests.
testcase.preconditions: All created tests will be successfully displayed.

step.actions: Click on "My tests" item on left panel.
step.expectedresults: "My tests" screen will appear. There are two input above. Left one for search, right one for filtering of tests depending on category. All tests (including that one created by you) are displayed below.

step.actions: Click on search input and enter "e" character.
step.expectedresults: No changes will be made on the screen.

step.actions: Click on search input, delete previously typed characters and enter "j" character.
step.expectedresults: Only "Java test" will appear.

step.actions: Click on search input, delete previously typed characters and enter "x" character.
step.expectedresults: Only "Exercise test" will appear.

step.actions: Click on "Choose category" dropdown button placed next to the search input. Choose HTML option.
step.expectedresults: Tests will disappear from the screen. "No tests found" message will appear.

step.actions: Click on "Choose category" dropdown button again. Then choose "Java" option.
step.expectedresults: Tests will be displayed.

step.actions: Click on edit option inside of  "Exercise test" box.
step.expectedresults: You will be redirected to another screen. White window with "Test name: Exercise test" on the top will appear. On the right side there is stated "Test category: Java".

testcase.name: Add new question
testcase.summary:
Check functionality of adding new question to the test.
Check functonality of checking blank input fields.
testcase.preconditions: Question will be correctly added to test.

step.actions: Click on the left blue button "Add new question".
step.expectedresults: Dialog window with "Add new question" title will appear.

step.actions: Click on the green button "Add the question" in the bottom.
step.expectedresults: Message box "Vyplňte toto pole" will appear under the input with preset value "Type in your question".

step.actions: Enter one or more spaces in the input with preset value "Type in your question". Click on the green button "Add the question" in the bottom.
step.expectedresults: Message box "Vyplňte toto pole" will appear under the input with preset value "Type in your question".

step.actions: Enter "My Question" into upper field and enter one or more spaces in the input for Answer A. Click on the green button "Add the question" in the bottom.
step.expectedresults: Message box "Vyplňte toto pole" will appear under the input for Answer A.

step.actions: Delete entered space/spaces in upper input and type "My Question" into this input. Then click on green button "Add the question".
step.expectedresults: Message box "Vyplňte toto pole" will appear under the input for Answer A.

step.actions: Enter "First" into input for Answer A. Then click on "Add the question" button.
step.expectedresults: Message box "Vyplňte toto pole" will appear under the input for Answer B.

step.actions: Enter "Second" into input for Answer B. Then click on "Add the question" button.
step.expectedresults: Message box "Vyplňte toto pole" will appear under the input for Answer C.

step.actions: Enter "Third" into input for Answer C. Then click on "Add the question" button.
step.expectedresults: Message box "Vyplňte toto pole" will appear under the input for D-answer.

step.actions: Firstly enter "Fourth" into input for Answer D. Secondly delete entered text from topmost input. Finally click on "Add the question" button.
step.expectedresults: Message box "Vyplňte toto pole" will appear under the input with preset value "Type in your question".

step.actions: Enter "My Question" in the topmost input. Then click click on grey button "Close" in bottom right corner.
step.expectedresults: Dialog window for editing of questions will disappear.

step.actions: Click on the blue button "Add new question".
step.expectedresults:
Dialog window with "Add new quesiton" title will appear. There will be some value inserted in:

Upper input: My Question
Points: 1
Answer A: First
Answer B: Second
Answer C: Third
Answer D: Fourth

Radio button "Correct" will be selected for Answer A choice.

step.actions: Click on the "Points" dropdown. Select "4" choice. Next select radio button "Correct" for Answer C. Then click in the green button "Add the question".
step.expectedresults:
Dialog window will disappear. Created question will be added to list.
Parameters of question:
Question: My question
Answers: Answers - hover effect will show all answers (A. First, B. Second,C. Third,D. Fourth)

testcase.name: Choose from existing questions
testcase.summary: Check if it's possible to add foreign question into the test.
testcase.preconditions: Question will be successfully added.

step.actions: Click on the right blue button "Choose from existing questions".
step.expectedresults: Dialog window "Choose from existing questions" will appear.

step.actions:
Click on the dropdown button and select test you want to import question from.
For example "Java test".
step.expectedresults:
List of questions will appear under dropdown button.
There are 3 questions.

step.actions: Click on the grey button "Close".
step.expectedresults: Dialog window will disappear and no question will be added to "Exercise test".

step.actions: Click on the blue button "Choose from existing questions".
step.expectedresults: Dialog window "Choose from existing questions" will appear.

step.actions:
Click on the dropdown button and select test you want to import question from.
For example "Big HTML test".
step.expectedresults: List of questions will appear under dropdown button. There are 3 questions listed.

step.actions:
Click on the dropdown button and select test you want to import question from.
For example "Java test".
step.expectedresults: List of questions will appear under dropdown button. There are 3 questions listed

step.actions: Click on the green button "Add" for question "JavaFX is used for creating of...?".
step.expectedresults: Dialog window will disappear and added question will be displayed in the list of questions below.

testcase.name: Edit question
testcase.preconditions: Question properties can be edited successfully.

step.actions: Click on the "Edit" button under "JavaFX is used for creating of...?" question.
step.expectedresults:
Dialog window will appear.


Displayed properties will be:
Points: 3
Answer A: Server
Answer B: GUI (correct)
Answer C: Test applications
Answer D: Database scripts

step.actions: Click on "Points" dropdown button.
step.expectedresults: Select option "4" and click on grey "Close" button.

step.actions: Click on the "Edit" button under "JavaFX is used for creating of...?" question.
step.expectedresults:
Dialog window will appear.


Displayed properties will be:
Points: 3
Answer A: Server
Answer B: GUI (correct)
Answer C: Test applications
Answer D: Database scripts

step.actions: Click on "Points" dropdown button.
step.expectedresults: Select option "4" and click on green "Save" button.

step.actions: Click on the "Edit" button under "JavaFX is used for creating of...?" question.
step.expectedresults:
Dialog window will appear.


Displayed properties will be:
Points: 4
Answer A: Server
Answer B: GUI (correct)
Answer C: Test applications
Answer D: Database scripts

testcase.name: Delete question
testcase.preconditions: Question will be removed correctly.

step.actions: Click on red "Delete" button under "My question".
step.expectedresults: Alert window "Are you sure you want to delete this question?" will appear.

step.actions: Click on "Cancel" choice inside of alert window.
step.expectedresults: Alert window will disappear and no changes will be made.

step.actions: Click on red "Delete" button under "My question".
step.expectedresults: Alert window "Are you sure you want to delete this question?" will appear.

step.actions: Click on "OK" choice inside of alert window.
step.expectedresults: Alert window will disappear and selected question will be removed from list of questions.

testcase.name: Activate test
testcase.preconditions: Test will be activated and it will be not possible to editit anymore.

step.actions:
Click on "My tests" item on left panel.
If you are currently on "My tests" page, you may skip this step.
step.expectedresults: "My tests" screen will appear.

step.actions: Move mouse cursor on blue "Activate" button.
step.expectedresults: Black message box "After activating the test, you will not be able to edit it anymore" will appear.

step.actions: Click on "Activate" button.
step.expectedresults: Alert window "Are you sure you want to activate this test? After activating the test you will not be able to edit the test in any way" will appear in the top of the screen.

step.actions: Click on cancel button inside of alert window.
step.expectedresults: Alert window will disappear.

step.actions: Click on "Activate" button.
step.expectedresults: Alert window "Are you sure you want to activate this test? After activating the test you will not be able to edit the test in any way" will appear in the top of the screen.

step.actions: Click on OK button inside of alert window.
step.expectedresults: "Activate" button will change to green bordered "Enable" button and edit option will disappear.

testcase.name: Enable/Hide test
testcase.preconditions: Test will be allowed and available for students.

step.actions:
Click on "My tests" item on left panel.
If you are currently on "My tests" page, you may skip this step.
step.expectedresults: "My tests" screen will appear.

step.actions: Click on green bordered "Enable" button inside of  "Exercise test" box.
step.expectedresults: Test will be allowed for students, button "Enable" will change to "Hide" and test box will be green bordered.

step.actions: Click on yellow bordered "Hide" button inside of "Exercise test" box.
step.expectedresults: Test will be hidden for students, button "Hide" will change back to "Enable" and green border will disappear.

testcase.name: Show students
testcase.summary: Check functionality of displaying of all students.
testcase.preconditions: All students will be displayed correctly.

step.actions: Click on the "Students" item on left panel.
step.expectedresults:
You will be redirected to "Students" page.
There will be displayed list of all (two) students.
Boris Galický and Erik Ruszinka.

step.actions: Enter "q" character into the search input.
step.expectedresults: All of students will disappear.

step.actions: Erase content of search input and enter "b" character.
step.expectedresults: Only student "Boris Galický" will appear.

step.actions: Erase content of search input and enter "z" character.
step.expectedresults: Only student "Erik Ruszinka" will appear.

step.actions: Erase content of search input and enter "r" character.
step.expectedresults: Both students will be displayed.

step.actions:
Erase content of search input and click on dropdown button placed on right side.
Choose "3.N" choice.
step.expectedresults: All of students will disappear. Insteam of them there will be displayed message "No students found".

step.actions: Click on dropdown button placed on right side. Choose "2.N" choice.
step.expectedresults: There will be still displayed message "No students found".

step.actions: Click on dropdown button placed on right side. Choose "1.N" choice.
step.expectedresults: Two students (Boris Galický, Erik Ruszinka) will be displayed.

testcase.name: Remove student
testcase.preconditions: Student will be successfully removed from students list.

step.actions:
Click on "Students" item on left panel.
If you are currently on "Students" page, you may skip this step.
step.expectedresults:
You will be redirected to "Students" page.
There will be displayed list of all (two) students.
Boris Galický and Erik Ruszinka.

step.actions: Click on "Erik Ruszinka".
step.expectedresults: You will be redirected to profile page.

step.actions: Click on the green button "Archive".
step.expectedresults: "Students" page will appear. Red window "Student archived" will appear above.

testcase.name: Show student details
testcase.summary: Check functionality of displaying of student details.
testcase.preconditions: Teacher should be redirected to student's profile page.

step.actions:
Click on "Students" item on left panel.
If you are currently on "Students" page, you may skip this step.
step.expectedresults:
You will be redirected to "Students" page.
There will be displayed list of all students.
There will be only one student - Boris Galický.

step.actions: Click on "Boris Galický".
step.expectedresults:
Profile page of student "Boris Galický" will be displayed.
Graphs of student's result will be displayed below.

testcase.name: Change password
testcase.preconditions: Password will be successfully changed - new password will be generated.

step.actions:
Click on "Students" item on left panel.
If you are currently on "Students" page, you may skip this step.
step.expectedresults:
You will be redirected to "Students" page.
There will be displayed list of all students.
There will be only one student - Boris Galický.

step.actions:
Click on "Boris Galický".
If you have already clicked on "Boris Galický" student, you may skip this step.
step.expectedresults: Profile page of student "Boris Galický" will be displayed.

step.actions: Click on the button "Change password".
step.expectedresults: Newly generated password will be sent to student's email address. Page will be refreshed and no changes will be made on the screen.

step.actions:
Click on "Students" item on left panel.
Then click on "Boris Galický".
If you are currently on Boris Galický's profile page, you may skip this step.
step.expectedresults: Profile page of student "Boris Galický" will appear.

step.actions: Click on red button "Archive" under the name of student.
step.expectedresults: Student will disappear from the screen and red box message "Student archived" will appear above.

testcase.name: Show teachers
testcase.summary: Check functionality of displaying all of teachers.
testcase.preconditions: All teachers will be displayed correctly.

step.actions: Click on "Teachers" item on left panel.
step.expectedresults: "Teachers" page will appear. There are four teachers in the screen. Roland Onofrej, John Doe, First Teacher and Second Teacher.

testcase.name: Invite teacher
testcase.preconditions: Teacher will be registered and he will get his login data via e-mail.

step.actions:
Click on "Teachers" item on left panel.
If you are currently on "Students" page, you may skip this step.
step.expectedresults: "Teachers" page will appear. There are four teachers in the screen. Roland Onofrej, John Doe, First Teacher and Second Teacher.

step.actions: Click on the green button "Invite teacher" below.
step.expectedresults: Alert window will appear in the top of the screen.

step.actions: Click on the closing cross in the top right corner inside the alert window.
step.expectedresults: Alert window will disappear.

step.actions: Click on the green button "Invite teacher" below.
step.expectedresults: Alert window will appear in the top of the screen.

step.actions: Fill inputs "First Name" and "Last Name" with some values and insert into "E-Mail" input some e-mail address you have access to. And click on the green button "Send invitation".
step.expectedresults: E-mail message with generated password will be sent to entered email address, Newly registered teacher can login with e-mail address to which he recieved message with new password.

testcase.name: Archive and delete teacher
testcase.summary: Check functionality of removing and archiving a teacher.
testcase.preconditions: Teacher will be successfully removed.

step.actions: Click on "Log out" option in top right corner of the screen.
step.expectedresults: You will be logged out and redirected to login page.

step.actions:
Login as "Roland Onofrej".
Enter "roland.onofrej@akademiasovy.sk" into "E-mail" input.
Enter "XIP3Lq" into "Password input".
Click on the "Login" button.
step.expectedresults: You will be successfully logged in.

step.actions: Click on "Teachers" item on left panel.
step.expectedresults: "Teachers" page will appear. There are four teachers in the screen. Roland Onofrej, John Doe, First Teacher and Second Teacher.

step.actions: Click on green button "Archive" which belongs to First Teacher.
step.expectedresults: "First Teacher" will disappear from the page and red box message "Teacher archived" will appear above.

step.actions: Click on red button "Delete" which belongs to Second Teacher.
step.expectedresults: Alert window "Warning, following action is irreversible. Continue?" will appear above.

step.actions: Click on cancel option inside of alert window.
step.expectedresults: Alert window will disappear and no changes will be made.

step.actions: Click on red button "Delete" which belongs to Second Teacher.
step.expectedresults: Alert window "Warning, following action is irreversible. Continue?" will appear above.

step.actions: Click on "OK" option inside of alert window.
step.expectedresults: Alert window will disappear. Red box message "Teacher deleted" will be displayed in the top of the screen and Second Teacher will be missing on the list of teachers.

step.actions:
Click on "Teachers" item on left panel.
If you are currently on "Students" page, you may skip this step.
step.expectedresults: "Teachers" page will appear. There are four teachers in the screen. Roland Onofrej, John Doe, First Teacher and Second Teacher.

testcase.name: Change password - TO DO
testcase.preconditions: Password will be changed.

testcase.name: Logout
testcase.preconditions: User will be logged out.

step.actions: Click on "Log out"option in right top corner of the screen.
step.expectedresults: You will be logged out and redirected to login page.

testcase.name: Login
testcase.summary:
Check login in these cases:

  1. Incorrect email with incorrect password
  2. Any correct email with incorrect password
  3. Incorrect email with any correct password
  4. Correct email with correct password
testcase.preconditions: Log in is successful in 4th case only.

step.actions: Enter email "1234@test.sk", enter password "123".
step.expectedresults: "Wrong email or password!" message will appear under input below.

step.actions: Enter email "123@test.sk", enter password "123".
step.expectedresults: "Wrong email or password!" message will appear under input below.

step.actions: Enter email "1234@test.sk", enter password "1234".
step.expectedresults: "Wrong email or password!" message will appear under input below.

step.actions: Enter email "123@test.sk", enter password "1234".
step.expectedresults: Login successful. Full screen main page will appear.

testcase.name: Show user profile
testcase.preconditions: User profile will be shown properly.

step.actions: Click on right top dropdown button marked as "Johny Walker".
step.expectedresults: List with options will be shown.

step.actions: Click on "User Profile" option from list.
step.expectedresults: User profile will be opened.

testcase.name: Marks score
testcase.preconditions: Marks score window will be shown

step.actions: Click on right top dropdown button marked as "Johny Walker".
step.expectedresults: List of options will appear.

step.actions: Click on "Marks score" option from list.
step.expectedresults: Marks score window will be shown.

testcase.name: Change password
testcase.preconditions: Password will be changed only if it's longer than 4 characters, entered password in field "NEW password" will matched with field "NEW password again" and "OLD password" field will matched with old password

step.actions: Click on right top dropdown button marked as "Johny Walker".
step.expectedresults: List of options will appear.

step.actions: Click on "Change password" option.
step.expectedresults: New window with three fields "Here insert NEW password", "Here insert NEW password again" and "Here insert OLD password" will open.

step.actions:
1. In field "Here insert NEW password" insert "4321"
  2. In field "Here insert NEW password" insert "54321"
  3. In field "Here insert OLD password" insert "1234"
step.expectedresults: Password cannot be changed

step.actions:
1. In field "Here insert NEW password" insert "54321"
  2. In field "Here insert NEW password" insert "4321"
  3. In field "Here insert OLD password" insert "1234"
step.expectedresults: Password cannot be changed

step.actions:
1. In field "Here insert NEW password" insert "4321"
  2. In field "Here insert NEW password" insert "4321"
  3. In field "Here insert OLD password" insert "1234"
step.expectedresults: Password cannot be changed

step.actions:
1. In field "Here insert NEW password" insert "54321"
  2. In field "Here insert NEW password" insert "54321"
  3. In field "Here insert OLD password" insert "12345"
step.expectedresults: Password cannot be changed

step.actions:
1. In field "Here insert NEW password" insert "64321"
  2. In field "Here insert NEW password" insert "54321"
  3. In field "Here insert OLD password" insert "1234"
step.expectedresults: Password cannot be changed

step.actions:
1. In field "Here insert NEW password" insert "54321"
  2. In field "Here insert NEW password" insert "64321"
  3. In field "Here insert OLD password" insert "1234"
step.expectedresults: Password cannot be changed

step.actions: Leave any of fields blank
step.expectedresults: Password cannot be changed

step.actions:
1. In field "Here insert NEW password" insert "54321"
  2. In field "Here insert NEW password" insert "54321"
  3. In field "Here insert OLD password" insert "1234"
step.expectedresults: Password will succesfully changed to "54321" and window will be closed

testcase.name: Choose test
testcase.preconditions: After choosing of test, you will be redirected to window with selected test.

step.actions: Click on left dropdown button marked as "Choose categories".
step.expectedresults: The list of categories will appear.

step.actions: Select "HTML" from categories.
step.expectedresults: The dropdown mark title will change to "HTML".

step.actions: Click on right dropdown button marked as "Tests".
step.expectedresults: The list of HTML tests will appear.

step.actions: Click on "Big HTML test".
step.expectedresults: The test will open in another full screen window with opened first question.

testcase.name: Test filling - Finish
testcase.preconditions: Test will be finished only if one answer for each question has been selected.

step.actions: Click on answer "Bold text".
step.expectedresults: Answer "Bold text" will be selected.

step.actions: Click on "Submit answer" button.
step.expectedresults: The answered question in left top corner will be changed from red color to green and you will be redirected to "Question 2".

step.actions: Click on "Question 1" tab on left top corner.
step.expectedresults: The "Question 1" will appear with blue outline.

step.actions: Click on "Italic text" answer.
step.expectedresults: Answer will be changed from "Bold text" to "Italic text".

step.actions: Click on "Submit answer" button
step.expectedresults: You will be redirected to "Question 2"

step.actions: Click on "Submit answer" button
step.expectedresults: You will not be not redirected to "Question 3". There will be made no changes on the screen.

step.actions: Click on any answer and click on "Submit answer" button.
step.expectedresults: You will be redirected to "Question 3".

step.actions: Select any answer and click on "Submit answer" button.
step.expectedresults:
Test will be completed and closed.
{something will appear}

testcase.name: Log out
testcase.summary: Checking funcionality of logging out a user.
testcase.preconditions: User will be logged out and application will be closed.

step.actions: Click on right top dropdown button marked as "Johny Walker".
step.expectedresults: List with options will be shown.

step.actions: Click on option "Log out".
step.expectedresults: User will be logged out and application will be closed.
